channel.title: Pktilldawn v3
channel.description:
[center][url=http://pktilldawn.com]pktilldawn.com[/url][/center]
[center]PkTillDawn is a server with Pvm & Pvp Community! I hope u guys will check the server out and i hope u guys like it !
The server is 24/7 hosted on a decated server specs of the server =
cpu =Intel Xeon 2x E5-2670v2
cores/threads= 20c/40t
frequentcie= 2,5Ghz+/3.3Ghz+
ram= 256 GB DDR3 ECC 1600MHz
hard disks= 2x 2TB Sata3 HGST Ent. 7k4000
Anti-DDos protection
Pictures:
Animated Lava Torva!![/center] [left][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4784774/lava_torva.png[/img][/left]
[center]Custom Avatar!![/center] [left][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4784776/avatar.png[/img][/left]
[center]Custom Slayer Armour!![/center] [left][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4784778/slayer_master_armour.png[/img][/left]
[center][size=12pt]Server Features:[/size] New Custom Home New Custom Shop Area QBD KBD Kalph Custom Slayer Shop and Tasks Highscores added Skills all working Full Jadinko Lair Corp Nex Godwars Full Barrows Glacors Bork Dag Kings Jad Warriors Guild Duel Avatar King Kevin Primal Boss Custom Hararken boss Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk Custom Home pvp Area Random pvp drop system with pkpoints Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Prestige System. Auto Vote System 100s of Custom Items Tons of pets in-game Working Dungeoneering, Hunter, Summoning. Chaotics Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots[/CENTER][/center]

item.title: Pktilldawn v3
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Firstly, you need to add more media. Like the pictures you currently provided are not showing anything and are therefore pointless.

Also, some of your so-called server features, aren’t even features at all. Since when are items features? None of your features are unique, significant, or shows what makes your server good in any way.

I really don’t see the point in having a dedi server with 256 GB… Unless you’re Ikov it is a complete waste of money.

Read full topic
